sentences.en: The sound of footsteps on the path broke the stillness.
sentences.cn: 小路上的脚步声打破了宁静。

sentences.en: The stillness of the night was broken by the boom of a cannon.
sentences.cn: 夜晚的寂静被大炮的轰鸣声打破了。

sentences.en: Four deafening explosions shattered the stillness of the night air.
sentences.cn: 4声震耳欲聋的爆炸打破了夜空的宁静。
